meanings.sent1: The ungreenest apple in the bunch was a bright red.
meanings.sent2: The grass in the yard was the ungreenest shade I had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The ungreenest traffic light confused the drivers.
meanings.sent4: Her ungreenest outfit stood out in a sea of green dresses.
meanings.sent5: The ungreenest leaves on the tree were turning yellow.

meanings.sent1: The ungreenest factory in town polluted the river.
meanings.sent2: Their ungreenest practices harmed the environment.
meanings.sent3: The ungreenest car on the road belched black smoke.
meanings.sent4: Living in the ungreenest city made her appreciate nature more.
meanings.sent5: The ungreenest building wasted energy and resources.
